claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Marvel Cinematic Universe  (  MCU  )  is an American media franchise and shared universe that is centered on a series of superhero films , independently produced by Marvel Studios and based on characters that appear in publications by Marvel Comics .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The franchise has expanded to include comic books , short films , television series and digital series .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The shared universe , much like the original Marvel Universe in comic books , was established by crossing over common plot elements , settings , cast , and characters .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Phil Coulson , portrayed by Clark Gregg , is an original character to the MCU and the only character to appear across all the different media of the MCU .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The first film released in the MCU was Iron Man  (  2008  )  , which began the first phase of films culminating in the crossover film Marvel 's The Avengers  (  2012  )  .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Phase Two began with Iron Man 3  (  2013  )  , and concluded with Ant-Man  (  2015  )  .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The films are currently in Phase Three , which began with the release of Captain America : Civil War  (  2016  )  .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Marvel Television expanded the universe further , first to network television with Marvel 's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. on ABC in the 2013 -- 14 television season , followed by online streaming with Marvel 's Daredevil on Netflix in 2015 , and then to cable television with Marvel 's Cloak & Dagger , which is scheduled to air in 2018 on Freeform .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Marvel Television has also produced the digital series Marvel 's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. : Slingshot , which is a supplement to Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. Soundtrack albums have been released for all of the films , along with many of television series , as well as the release of compilation albums containing existing music heard in the films .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The MCU also includes tie-in comics published by Marvel Comics , while Marvel Studios has also produced a series of direct-to-video short films and a viral marketing campaign for its films and the universe with the faux news program WHIH Newsfront .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The franchise has been commercially successful as a multimedia shared universe , though some critics have found that some of its films and television series have suffered in service of the wider universe .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It has inspired other film and television studios with comic book character adaptation rights to attempt to create similar shared universes .

claim: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's first phase lasted ten years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The MCU has also been the focus of other media , outside of the shared universe , including attractions at the Disneyland Resort and Discovery Times Square , two television specials , guidebooks for each film , a Lego video game , and a commercial with Coca-Cola .
